SEARCH
Package view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui, NetworkView
public interface View
This interface will be implemented by both the CLI and the GUI. It's also implemented in the networkview.

  • Method Details

    • askNickname

      void askNickname()
      Ask to insert the player's nickname

    • askMaxPlayer

      void askMaxPlayer()
      Ask to insert the maximum number of players for the match

    • askBoardMove

      void askBoardMove()
      Ask to insert a move regarding the board

    • askLibraryMove

      void askLibraryMove()
      Ask to insert a move regarding the library

    • showGenericError

      void showGenericError(String player, String payload)
      This method will show a generic error.
      Parameters:
      player - is the recipient of the error.
      payload - is the error's description.

    • showTurn

      void showTurn(String player, Board gameBoard, Library playerLibrary, ArrayList<ObjectCard> playerObjInHand, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints, String firstPlayerToEnd, String playerNickname)
      This method will show the current turn of the game, whether it's for the player in turn or not. It will be up to the client to check if it's for him.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      gameBoard - is the board of the game.
      playerLibrary - is the player's library.
      playerObjInHand - are the objects the player currently has in hand.
      completedCommonObjectives - is the array of points for each completed common objective.
      availableCommonObjectivePoints - is the array of available points for each common objective.
      firstPlayerToEnd - is the nickname of the first player that has finished the game.
      playerNickname - is the nickname of the player. Needed for the GUI.

    • showCommonObjectives

      void showCommonObjectives(String player, CommonObjective commonObjective1, CommonObjective commonObjective2, int[] completedCommonObjectives, int[] availableCommonObjectivePoints)
      This method will show the common objectives to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      commonObjective1 - is the first common objective.
      commonObjective2 - is the second common objective.
      completedCommonObjectives -
      availableCommonObjectivePoints -

    • showPersonalObjective

      void showPersonalObjective(String player, PersonalObjective personalObjective)
      This method will show the personal objective to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player currently playing.
      personalObjective - is the player's personal objective.

    • showLobby

      void showLobby(ArrayList<String> players)
      This method will show the lobby while all the players are connecting to the game.
      Parameters:
      players - is an ArrayList containing the usernames of the currently connected players.

    • showWinner

      void showWinner(String winner, HashMap<String,Integer> leaderboard)
      This method will show the winner and the leaderboard when the game ends.
      Parameters:
      winner - is the username of the winner.
      leaderboard - is a HashMap containing the pairs (username, points).

    • showNotMyTurn

      void showNotMyTurn(Board gameBoard)
      This method will show the board when the player currently in its turn.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - is the board of the game.

    • showOthersLibrary

      void showOthersLibrary(String sender, HashMap<String,Library> librariesOfPlayers)
      This method will show the other players' library to the player in turn.
      Parameters:
      sender - is the sender of the message.
      librariesOfPlayers - is the HashMap containing the other players' usernames as keys and libraries as values.

    • showChat

      void showChat(String sender, boolean isPrivate, String message)
      This method will show the chat message
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender of the message
      isPrivate - indicate if the message is private
      message - is the message text

    • getMyTurn

      boolean getMyTurn()
      Return if the player is the player in turn
      Returns:
      true if the player is the player in turn

    • setMyTurn

      void setMyTurn(boolean turn)
      Set the myTurn parameter
      Parameters:
      turn - is the new value of the myTurn parameter

    • askChat

      void askChat()
      Handle the chat service when the player is not in turn

    • getChatAbilitator

      boolean getChatAbilitator()
      Return the value of the chatAbilitator parameter
      Returns:
      true if the chat service is still enabled

    • setChatAbilitator

      void setChatAbilitator(boolean value)
      Set the value of the chatAbilitator Parameter
